name: Holding It Together
description:
An abstract game about the struggles of general life, how it can sometimes be hard to hold onto everything all at once and how once you do grab something, it changes.

Connect the circles to the main hub. Get as high a score as possible and submit it. Don't let the circles fall off the screen or they will be lost forever.

Drag using the left mouse button to different circles from the hub. If unconnected they will fall off the screen. Try to lose as few as possible. Circles change colour throughout the game and disconnect, so make sure to keep an eye on them.

Link to the website for this game.

Music by Sarah Hargreaves
